titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Program Division FA1702

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:07:14 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by office or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of office files, program files and administrative records.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Ford Foundation's Program Division was composed of vice presidents, program officers, grants administrators, research assistants, and executive assistants within the Foundation's U.S. and International Affairs Program and Developing Country Programs between 1986 and 1988.
